translations: 复仇女神三姐妹（希腊神话中的形象）

sentences.sentence: He could only be kept from furies dangerous to himself by being given his own way in every detail.
sentences.translation: 只有在每一个细节上都按他自己的方式行事，才能使他远离那些对他有危险的愤怒。

sentences.sentence: Furies tear my eyes out if I lie!
sentences.translation: 若是我撒谎，让复仇女神把我的眼睛挖出来！

sentences.sentence: You've unleashed Furies, you don't know their power.
sentences.translation: 你没有点燃那些愤怒，你不知道他们的力量。
